sect2.para: The Multiarch Wrapper is used to wrap certain binaries that have hardcoded paths to libraries or are architecture specific.

sect2.title: Installation de The Multiarch Wrapper
sect2.para: Compile and Install the Multiarch Wrapper:
This multiarch wrapper is going to be used later on in the book with Perl. It will also be very useful outside of the base CLFS system.

screen.userinput: echo 'echo "32bit Version"' > test-32 echo 'echo "64bit Version"' > test-64 chmod 755 test-32 test-64 ln -sv /usr/bin/multiarch_wrapper test

sect2.para: The output of the above command should be:

listitem.para: Will execute a different program based on the USE_ARCH variable. The USE_ARCH variable will be the suffix of the executed program.
